about.title: Senior Software & Cloud Engineer
about.brief: Mohammad Nasr is an expert software & cloud engineer

introduction.part1: I am a forward looking Software Engineer with a passion for delivering exceptional results.
introduction.part2: With my expertise in Cloud and Backend specially using Go, python, Bash, Lua and Rust, I bring a unique combination of technical skills and creative problem-solving to every project I work on.

about.interests: I am interested in open-source communities, Cloud Technologies, Networking, Linux, Cryptography, Algorithms, Machine Learning, System Design and loves reading technical books.
